authors.name: Felix Kraus

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ea5g0","text":"Protocol for the microscopy-based evaluation of mtKeima flux in hESC-derived Ctrl and FBXO7-/- iNeurons","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cd1v7","text":"Day 0: Treat AAVS1-TRE3G-NGN2 cells with Accutase and plate the dissociated cells in matrigel-coated 6-well plates (2x105 cells/well) in ND1 Medium supplemented with Y27632 (10 μM).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ccs73","text":"ND1 Medium:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1drmb","text":"DMEM/F12 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9r7e1","text":"N2 (100x)        1x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"41hh1","text":"BDNF              10 ng/ml  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"16hlf","text":"NT3                 10 ng/ml  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ov8f","text":"NEAA (100X) 1x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7mt89","text":"Laminin           0.2 μg/ml  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ektgl","text":"Doxycycline    2 μg/ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9c4h","text":"Day 2: Replace the medium with ND2 Medium.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e6ko3","text":"ND2 Medium  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ehq74","text":"Neurobasal medium  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bsuq2","text":"B27 (50x)                    1x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"34fdg","text":"GlutaMax (100x)         1x  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"35fdg","text":"BDNF                          10 ng/ml  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fl582","text":"NT3                             10 ng/ml  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9vq0k","text":"Doxycycline                2 μg/ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bmumu","text":"Day 4: Exchange 50% of the medium from each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81odo","text":"Day 6: Treat the cells with Accutase and replate the dissociated cells in matrigel-coated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u72m","text":"6-/12-well glass bottom plates (2-4x105 cells/well for 6 wells) in ND2 Medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1maob","text":"Day 8 and thereafter: Exchange 50% of the medium from each well every other day.  ·       Doxycycline can be withdrawn on Day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"elnu0","text":"Mount glass bottom plate on Yokogawa CSU-W1 spinning disk confocal on a Nikon Eclipse Ti-E motorized microscope. Ensure that the system is equipped with a Tokai Hit stage top incubator and imaging was performed at 37°C, 5% CO2 and 95% humidity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2smrt","text":"Take image stacks using a Nikon Plan Apo 60×/1.40 N.A immersion oil objective lens.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qoln","text":"For ratiometic imaging, mtKeimaXL were excited in sequential manner with a Nikon LUN-F XL solid state laser combiner ([laser line – laser power]: 445 - 80mW, 561 – 65 mW]) using a Semrock Di01-T445/515/561 dichroic mirror. Fluorescence emissions were collected through a Chroma ET605/52m [for 445 nm] and a 568 Chroma ET605/52m [for 561 nm], filters, respectively (Chroma Technologies). Consistent laser intensity and exposure times must be maintained for all samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tss7","text":"Perform image quantification was in your tool of choice. Here we will use ImageJ/FiJi and custom-written batch-macros (https://github.com/harperlaboratory/FBXO7)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":119,"length":41}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C1FA980C497711EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/harperlaboratory/FBXO7"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vauv","text":"Divide raw confocal images of mitochondrial targeted mt-mKeimaXL [ex:561/ex:445],  resulting in a ratiometic image of only acidic Keima-puncta.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e05o0","text":"Subject resulting signals to background subtraction (rolling kernel size 25, sliding paraboloid) and convert into binary objects.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g1rt","text":"Use the \"Analyze Particles...\" command (pixel size exclusion: 0.5-∞, exclude edge objects) to measure foci-abundance and other morphological parameters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btlv6","text":"Save results for each image-stack as .csv files, together with the original ratiometic .tiff file for QC purposes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vn81","text":"Plot results in your tool of choice for graphing and statistical analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
